医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
基于人工智能的技术揭开了先天性肌无力综合征的秘密由 ICREA 研究员、巴塞罗那超级计算中心 - 国家超级计算中心 (BSC-CNS) 生命科学部主任 Alfonso Valencia 领导的国际科学家团队开发了一种基于人工智能 (AI) 的技术，用于研究并已成功地将其应用于确定先天性肌无力综合症出现的可能原因，这是一组罕见的遗传性疾病，会限制患者的活动能力并导致不同程度的肌肉无力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/AI-based-technology-unlocks-secrets-of-myasthenic-congenital-syndromes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/AI-based-technology-unlocks-secrets-of-myasthenic-congenital-syndromes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9062c711-31ad-43a2-bfa1-c12952537414 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 15:42:08 -0500 AI-based technology unlocks secrets of myasthenic-congenital syndromes
布法罗大学的研究可能为开发癌症药物提供更简化的方法药物发现可能是一个令人沮丧的反复试验过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/UB-research-may-offer-a-more-streamlined-approach-to-developmenting-cancer-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/UB-research-may-offer-a-more-streamlined-approach-to-developmenting-cancer-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=129d00e5-62c5-4955-a966-7b024c8294b2 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 15:36:17 -0500 UB research may offer a more streamlined approach to developing cancer drugs
使用氧化应激特征开发膀胱尿路上皮癌的预后模型一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 3 期，题为“Prognostic modeldevelopment and molecular subtypesidentification in氧化应激特征导致膀胱尿路上皮癌。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Developing-a-prognostic-model-for-bladder-urothelial-cancer-using-oxygen-stress-signatures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Developing-a-prognostic-model-for-bladder-urothelial-cancer-using-oxygen-stress-signatures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ce6fea2-59c5-4af3-a96b-bd8a4601dcf0 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 15:31:06 -0500 Developing a prognostic model for bladder urothelial cancer using oxidative stress signatures
通过 M 蛋白研究解锁冠状病毒结构几个世纪以来，冠状病毒引发了健康危机和经济挑战，传播 COVID-19 的冠状病毒 SARS-CoV-2 就是最近的一个例子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Unlocking-coronavirus-struct-through-M- Protein-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Unlocking-coronavirus-struct-through-M- Protein-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08c8b9c7-799c-428d-a150-fe50775905f8 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 15:26:32 -0500 Unlocking coronavirus structure through M protein research
为早期发现结节病而开发的突破性血液检测由韦恩州立大学医学院内科、分子医学和遗传学教授 Lobelia Samavati 医学博士领导并得到美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 支持的一个研究项目开发了一种快速、廉价地诊断结节病的工具一种慢性炎症性疾病，其特征是肺部和其他器官中出现称为肉芽肿的微小肿块。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Breakthrough-blood-test-development-for-early-detection-of-sarcoidosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Breakthrough-blood-test-development-for-early-detection-of-sarcoidosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d09182a-b3d1-4171-bea2-d8c862f80dda Wed, 28 Feb 2024 15:21:26 -0500 Breakthrough blood test developed for early detection of sarcoidosis
研究发现，脑电波可促进睡眠期间废物的清除睡眠中存在着一个悖论。它表面上的宁静与大脑的忙碌活动并存。夜色虽静，但大脑却远未休眠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Brain-waves-drive-waste-removal-during-sleep-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Brain-waves-drive-waste-removal-during-sleep-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e5f6527-7c3d-423f-8754-627159801752 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 15:06:31 -0500 Brain waves drive waste removal during sleep, study finds
基于人工智能的模型提高了 II 型糖尿病预防工作的效率更好地预防二型糖尿病可以挽救生命和金钱。美国每年花费超过 7300 亿美元——；近三分之一的医疗保健支出 -；治疗糖尿病等可预防疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/AI-based-model-enhances-efficiency-of-Type-II-diabetes-prevention-efforts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/AI-based-model-enhances-efficiency-of-Type-II-diabetes-prevention-efforts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b9cb0ff-3bea-4c59-a628-10aea6d97bee Wed, 28 Feb 2024 15:00:13 -0500 AI-based model enhances efficiency of Type II diabetes prevention efforts
遭受邻里暴力与儿童健康需求未得到满足和护理利用增加有关波士顿医疗中心、布莱根妇女医院、波士顿儿童医院、亨内平医疗保健研究所、宾夕法尼亚大学和费城儿童医院之间的一项新合作研究发现，儿童遭受邻里暴力与健康需求未得到满足和急症护理利用率增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Exposure-to-neighborhood-violence-linked-to-unmet-health-needs-and-increased-care-utilization-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Exposure-to-neighborhood-violence-linked-to-unmet-health-needs-and-increased-care-utilization-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c8faba8-7b1c-470a-8931-d00007563b7c Wed, 28 Feb 2024 14:54:26 -0500 Exposure to neighborhood violence linked to unmet health needs and increased care utilization in children
研究发现哮喘控制不佳与温室气体排放过多有关哮喘控制不佳的患者的温室气体排放量是病情控制良好的患者的八倍，相当于英国每年 124,000 个家庭的温室气体排放量，这是第一项此类研究，发表在《Thorax》杂志在线版上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Poorly-control-asthma-linked-to-excessive-greenhouse-gas-emissions-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Poorly-control-asthma-linked-to-excessive-greenhouse-gas-emissions-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b8f9876-93c2-4c64-b61f-985084ffa708 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 14:49:58 -0500 Poorly controlled asthma linked to excessive greenhouse gas emissions, study finds
神经科学家发现神经胶质细胞在调节大脑神经元反应中的惊人作用弗雷德·哈钦森癌症中心的神经科学家发现，一种经常被忽视的神经胶质细胞在大脑功能中的作用比以前想象的要大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Neuroscientists-uncover-surprising-role-of-glia-in-regulate-neuronal-responses-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Neuroscientists-uncover-surprising-role-of-glia-in-regulate-neuronal-responses-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b3219c1-92ad-4ab1-a7e1-f94d72e640a5 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 14:47:36 -0500 Neuroscientists uncover surprising role of glia in regulating neuronal responses in the brain
